Package org.example.timetracker.Service

Class TimeTrackerService

java.lang.Object
org.example.timetracker.Service.TimeTrackerService
@Service @EnableAspectJAutoProxy public class TimeTrackerService extends Object
Service class for managing time tracking functionalities.

      userID - the user ID
      taskID - the task ID
      Returns:
      true if tracking started successfully, false otherwise
